level.heading: Declaratory judgment.
level.text: A for-profit entity or healthcare entity that has participated in the review process may bring an action for declaratory judgment against the decision of the Attorney General for the District of Columbia and may appeal the decision to the Superior Court according to the standards set forth in § 2-510.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Hospital and medical services corporation regulation, exclusivity of provisions, see § 31-3502.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "Attorney General for the District of Columbia" for "Corporation Counsel".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-32
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-32, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 44-601.
